name: HAMMER JOE
description:
Made for WASM-4 Game Jam

Controls

- move [arrow]

- jump [Z]

- attack [X]

Credits

This game is made using the fantasy console WASM-4 and use the EN4 color palette

Source code.

known bugs

- players can get stuck on the edge

- the enemy can be stuck on the wall when it bounces

- blue screen of the death (I hate this)
